an7.9:1.1: “Sattannaṃ, bhikkhave, saṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya samucchedāya brahmacariyaṃ vussati.
an7.9:1.3: Anunayasaṃyojanassa pahānāya samucchedāya brahmacariyaṃ vussati, paṭighasaṃyojanassa …pe…
an7.9:1.9: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, sattannaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya samucchedāya brahmacariyaṃ vussati.
an7.9:1.10: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno anunayasaṃyojanaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ.
an7.9:1.16: avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ.
an7.9:1.17: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu acchecchi taṇhaṃ, vivattayi saṃyojanaṃ, sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassā”ti.
